content:
cilium-dbg bgp 
 Access to BGP control plane 
 Options 
   -h, --help   help for bgp
 
 Options inherited from parent commands 
       --config string        Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug                Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string          URI to server-side API
      --log-driver strings   Logging endpoints to use (example: syslog)
      --log-opt map          Log driver options (example: format=json)
 
 SEE ALSO 
 
 cilium-dbg 	 - CLI 
 cilium-dbg bgp peers 	 - List current state of all peers 
 cilium-dbg bgp route-policies 	 - List configured route policies 
 cilium-dbg bgp routes 	 - List routes in the BGP Control Plane's RIBs
